org.rapla.mobile.android.browser.integration

Class ReservationEditIntentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapla.mobile.android.browser.integration.ReservationEditIntentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BrowserIntentHandler

    public class ReservationEditIntentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements BrowserIntentHandler
    This class handles browser intents for editing a reservation. Pattern: raplaclient://action/edit/reservation/{id}.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit

      void handleIntent(Context context, RaplaMobileApplication application, Intent intent, org.rapla.framework.RaplaContext raplaContext)
      Handle intent by reading the reservation id, putting the reservation into the runtime storage and starting the corresponding event details screen for editing the reservation.
      boolean matches(Uri data)
      Matches raplaclient://action/edit/reservation/{id}

        Matches raplaclient://action/edit/reservation/{id}
        Specified by:

      • handleIntent

        public void handleIntent(Context context,
                RaplaMobileApplication application,
                Intent intent,
                org.rapla.framework.RaplaContext raplaContext)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Handle intent by reading the reservation id, putting the reservation into the runtime storage and starting the corresponding event details screen for editing the reservation.
        Specified by:
        handleIntent in interface BrowserIntentHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The current context
        application - Reference to the custom application
        intent - The received intent
        raplaContext - The current rapla context
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If anything unexpected happens
        See Also:
        org.rapla.mobile.android.browser.integration.BrowserIntentHandler#handleIntent(android.content.Context, org.rapla.mobile.android.RaplaMobileApplication, android.content.Intent, org.rapla.framework.RaplaContext)
